name: RandomColor
0:
”Alexa, ask Random Color to give me a random color”
”Alexa, ask Random Color for a random color”
”Alexa, ask Random Color to tell me a random color”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random color
des: This skill will provide you with one of over 500 random color names. Ask this skill for a "Random Color" and hear what it gives you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
